INSERT INTO topic_result ( msq_result_id, topic_id, topic_result, topic_results ) VALUES
( #{item.msqResultId}, #{item.topicId}, #{item.topicResult}, #{item.topicResults, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.FastjsonTypeHandler} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.msq_id, t.msq_name, t.no, t.type, t.topic, t.options, tr.topic_result, tr.topic_results, tr.create_time FROM topic t JOIN topic_result tr ON t.id = tr.topic_id WHERE tr.msq_result_id = #{msqResultId} ORDER BY t.no ASC;
